theorem.name: exp_base_clause

text.english: Base clause of the definition of \(\texttt{exp}\): \[ \forall m \in \mathcal{N}Term .\; \texttt{exp}(Z, m) = S(Z) \]
text.italiano: Clausola base della definizione di \(\texttt{exp}\): \[ \forall m \in \mathcal{N}Term .\; \texttt{exp}(Z, m) = S(Z) \]

theorem.coq:
Theorem exp_base_clause : forall m : nterm , exp Z m = S Z.
Proof.
reflexivity.
Qed.
